myopenmath.statement:
Two aircraft are flying at 70 ktas. The Cessna Skyhawk has a stall speed of \displaystyle{v}_{{s}}={44}, and the Diamond Eclipse has a stall speed of \displaystyle{v}_{{s}}={34}.
The Cessna Skyhawk has a maximum load factor that is G's
lower
higher
than that of Diamond Eclipse.
Round to 3 decimal places. Note ktas is nm/hr.
